item.description:
Don't miss this one folks! Put your holiday stuff aside....Opening band will be Country Mile.

Nashville recording artist Sean Patrick McGraw will be performing live Saturday, December 4th at Midnight Rodeo Bar !!

Sean worked so very hard for the past year and was recognize as an amazing talent. After opening over twenty dates for Toby Keith and Trace Adkins, as well as an invitation to perform on Jimmy Kimmel Live in July. McGraw recently signed with new imprint Little Engine Records and is poised to... release a re-mastered, re-sequenced version of his CD “Long Way From Slowin’

Sean is thrilled to announce his single MY SO CALLED LIFE is at radio.....That's only part of it....He is hoping we will call whenever we can and request the song. The stations need a little push and we know once it's on air, it will fly.

Sean will be signing autographs and selling his CD in between Sets.
$10.00 cover charge
Doors open at 7:00

GET THERE EARLY IT WILL BE A PACKED HOUSE !!

www.myspace.com/seanpatrickmcgraw

Local Country Stations:
97.5 WOKQ
98.7 The Wink
93.3 The Wolf
item.name: Midnight Rodeo Bar Meetup
